title: Kalpataru
description: Official information system for the Kalpataru Awards under the Ministry of Forestry. Includes registration and data management for national award candidates.

title: Whale Shark Tourism GIS
description: A multilingual GIS web app to promote whale shark and information features ecotourism in Teluk Saleh. Built for Badan Riset dan Inovasi Nasional (BRIN).

title: ANDINI
description: Early marriage dispensation web application featuring document upload and status tracking. Developed in collaboration with PT Arkatama Multi Solusindo.

title: Vehicle Report
description: A web app for daily vehicle inspection for an environmental services company, enabling efficient data recording, tracking, and analysis of vehicle checks to support operational accuracy and compliance.

title: Desa Tejang
description: The Tejang Village web app provides easy access to the latest information and complaint services to make it easier for residents to access information and report problems online. (Temporarily deployed, preview available upon request)

title: BKI Activity
description: An employee management platform for PT Biro Klasifikasi Indonesia (BKI). Features include geolocation-based attendance, planning, and task monitoring.

title: Mangrovia
description: AI-powered web app for identifying mangrove species and suitable planting areas based on land characteristics and recognize types of mangroves based on images.

title: Seminar PSI
description: Web app for managing seminar attendance and automating certificate generation for a government agency.

title: Infocus News
description: News web application built with Vue.js and Laravel REST API, supporting article management and dynamic data fetching.

title: CineList
description: A server-side rendered movie listing app built with Next.js and React.js, elegantly presenting a list of movies.

title: Filmdex
description: A fetching website employing Vue.js to interact with an API, elegantly presenting a curated list of movies.

title: CineTracker
description: A simple web app that uses React.js to store watched movie data and display it in a list, by retrieving data from third-party APIs for dynamic content fetching.

title: RoboNoid
description: A responsive and interactive web app built with React.js that promotes the features of humanoid robots.

title: Pegawaiku
description: Employee data management system developed for Junior Web Developer from Badan Nasional Sertifikasi Profesi (BNSP).

title: COMBBIS
description: Cartography web app for mapping mangroves in Bangka Belitung. Visualizes mangrove density, health, and deforestation levels.

title: Logistik Kelautan
description: Official website for the Marine Logistics Study Program at Universitas Pendidikan Indonesia (UPI).
